name: Lute Hero
description:
Lute Hero is an rpg/rhythm game with a focus on Medieval and Renaissance music, combining the two classic genres of rhythm and turn-based role playing.

Your adventure begins in Luthar, a nation with a music-centric society in which a Hero's greatest calling is that of performance! Travelling from dusted tavern firesides to gilded palace halls, building your fame and riches, will you become the next Lute Hero?

Lute Hero's Kickstarter campaign was funded at 140% on September 2016. It is currently in open beta, and estimated for release around July 2017.
